# stack ls

```markdown
Usage:	docker stack ls

List stacks

Aliases:
  ls, list

Options:
      --help   Print usage
```

Lists the stacks.

For example, the following command shows all stacks and some additional information:

```bash
$ docker stack ls

ID                 SERVICES
vossibility-stack  6
myapp              2
```
